sentence: The team did resign some key free agents along the offensive line including starting center Brian Allen.

title: Former Super Bowl MVP Has Telling Insight Into Rams’ 2022 Expectations

sentence: So every day we were able to cover positive ground.” Current NFL linemen like Alex Cappa (Bengals), Justin Herron (Patriots), Isaiah Prince (Bengals), Brian Allen (Rams), Taylor Decker (Lions) also train at Bentley’s facility.

title: Roy Mbaeteka’s incredible journey from Nigeria to Giants’ roster: ‘From nowhere to somewhere’
